header.title: Zwishumiswa zwa Salatiso OHS
intro.title: Vhuḓifhindzelekani ha U Vaka
intro.description: Tshimbidza u tevedzela milayo ya vhutshilo na vhuḓifhindzelekani ha u vaka nga zwishumiswa zwa Salatiso OHS. Zwishumiswa zwashu zwi a u thusa u lawula zwiteṅwa, u tevedzela zwiḽiṅwa zwa mulayo, na u sirhelela vhashumi mo saetani, nga u shumisa zwivhudzisano zwavhuḓi zwine zwa vhaluswa kha "Vhuḓifhindzelekani Zwa u Sungula: Zwiḽiṅwa zwa Zwiteṅwa zwa OHS."
intro.download_link: Download Thulaganyo ya OHS ya U Vaka: Tshikelela Fhasi
legal_obligations.client.title: Maḓifhindzelekani a Muklayenti
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_a: Mulayo wa U Vaka 5(1)(a): Lulamisa U Ṱoḓisisa Vhuḓifhindzelekani ha Motheo (BRA) lune lwa ḓivhadza zwiteṅwa zwa projeke.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_b: Mulayo wa U Vaka 5(1)(b): Fha nga Tlhaluselo ya Vhutshilo & Vhuḓifhindzelekani leyi ḓivhadzaho zwiḽiṅwa zwi khethekaho zwa projeke.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_l: Mulayo wa U Vaka 5(1)(l): Amukela Zwiteṅwa zwa Vhutshilo & Vhuḓifhindzelekani zwa Mukontraka nga u vha mosebetsi u sa thomi.
legal_obligations.contractor.title: Maḓifhindzelekani a Mukontraka
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_a: Mulayo wa U Vaka 7(1)(a): Vhekanya Zwiteṅwa zwa Vhutshilo & Vhuḓifhindzelekani zwi thekhaho kha tlhaluselo ya muklayenti.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_b: Mulayo wa U Vaka 7(1)(b): Vhokanya Fhaele ya Vhutshilo & Vhuḓifhindzelekani mo saetani leyi na maphepha a zwiḽiṅwa hinkwawo.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9: Mulayo wa U Vaka 9: Endla U Ṱoḓisisa Vhuḓifhindzelekani na U Ḓivhadza Zwiteṅwa (HIRAs) nga ndila ye khethekaho.
legal_obligations.professional.title: Maḓifhindzelekani a Mutshidzi wa H&S
legal_obligations.professional.reg_5_5: Mulayo wa U Vaka 5(5): Ba-ejenti (PrCHSA) ba laula H&S nga lebitso la muklayenti, ba tshimbidza u tevedzela.
legal_obligations.professional.reg_8_5: Mulayo wa U Vaka 8(5): Vhaofisiri (CHSO) vha thusa Bakontraka ku shumisa na ku langutisa zwiteṅwa zwa H&S.
legal_obligations.professional.sacpcmp: Milayo ya SACPCMP: Vha fanela u vhokanya ngodiso na zwiḽiṅwa zwa CPD zwa maemo a vutshidzi.

cart.title: Sekhwama sa Wena
cart.invoice_reference: Nomboro ya Tshupo ya Invoysi: (I diraho mavhuvhili a 7. Ngodisani u boloka u ya nga nkarhi wothe!)
resources.title: Ikhouvhelani na Vhafunzi vha H&S vho Amukelwaho
resources.description: U ṱoḓa thuso ya vutshidzi? Ikhouvhelani na vhafunzi vho amukelwaho nga zwiḽiṅwa zwa projeke ya wena.

footer.newsletter.title: Vhokanyiwa nga Mafhungo
sidebar.step_0.title: 📜 U Tevedzela ha OHS
sidebar.step_0.description: Thoma nga u khetha zwitirelo u tshimbidza u tevedzela Mulayo wa Vhutshilo na Vhuḓifhindzelekani mo Tirong.
sidebar.step_0.fun_fact: ⚡ Tshenzhemo: Naa vha ḓivha uri maphepha a OHS a a nepagetsaho a nga fokotsa zwiteṅwa zwa mo tirong nga 30%? A ri thomeni!
sidebar.step_1.title: 📋 Mulayo
sidebar.step_1.description: Mulayo wa U Vaka 5(1)(b) u ḓivhadza Tlhaluselo ya Vhutshilo na Vhuḓifhindzelekani ya diprojeke dzothe, kha 7(1)(b) u ḓivhadza Fhaele ya H&S.
sidebar.step_1.fun_fact: 🛡️ Tshenzhemo: Tlhaluselo ye ya Tiisaho ya H&S i nga fokotsa zwiteṅwa nga 30%! I fanana na setlhako sa vhuḓifhindzelekani sa projeke ya wena.
sidebar.step_2.title: 📋 Mulayo
sidebar.step_2.description: Mulayo wa U Vaka 5: Baklayenti vha fanela u fha nga Tlhaluselo ya Vhutshilo & Vhuḓifhindzelekani na u tshimbidza u tevedzela nga bakontraka.
sidebar.step_2.fun_fact: 💼 Tshenzhemo: Baklayenti vha vhokanyang ngodiso ya COIDA vha nga itlhokomolosa dikotlo tse kholo—vhokanyani nomboro yone kgauswi!
sidebar.step_3.title: 📜 Mulayo
sidebar.step_3.description: Mulayo wa U Vaka 7(1)(a): Bakontraka vha fanela u vhekanya Zwiteṅwa zwa Vhutshilo & Vhuḓifhindzelekani zwi thekhaho kha tlhaluselo ya muklayenti.
sidebar.step_3.fun_fact: 🤝 Tshenzhemo: U bulela mukontraka nga u ṱavhanya u nga sathusa u tevedzela—mushumo wa tshitshavha u endla uri vhuḓifhindzelekani vhu endle!
sidebar.step_4.title: 📋 Mulayo
sidebar.step_4.description: Mulayo wa U Vaka 7(1)(b): Bakontraka vha fanela u vhokanya Fhaele ya Vhutshilo & Vhuḓifhindzelekani mo saetani leyi na maphepha hinkwawo a zwiḽiṅwa.
sidebar.step_4.fun_fact: 📞 Tshenzhemo: U vha na zwitshiyelo zwa u ikhouvha na yena zwa mukontraka zwi siamaho zwi nga hlayisa ḽifhinga ḽa vhuḓifhindzelekani—vhokanyani u ikhouvha!
sidebar.step_5.title: 📜 Mulayo
sidebar.step_5.description: Mulayo wa U Vaka 3(1): Vhutanzwa vhu ḓivhadzwa kha diprojeke dzi tshimbilaho R40,000 kana dzi tshimbilaho mavhuvhili a tshimbilaho 180.
sidebar.step_5.fun_fact: 🚧 Tshenzhemo: Adiresi ya saete ye i ḓivhadzaho i thusa zwitirelo zwa vhuḓifhindzelekani u mu wana nga u ṱavhanya—u nga si dumelela tshenzhemo ya u vhalwa u vike thuso!
sidebar.step_6.title: 📋 Mulayo
sidebar.step_6.description: Mulayo wa U Vaka 9: U Ṱoḓisisa Vhuḓifhindzelekani na U Ḓivhadza Zwiteṅwa (HIRAs) nga ndila ye khethekaho u ḓivhadzwa kha zwiteṅwa zwoṱhe.
sidebar.step_6.fun_fact: 🔍 Tshenzhemo: U wana zwiteṅwa zwi zwiteṅwa nga u ṱavhanya zwi nga fokotsa zwiteṅwa nga 25%—zwi fanana na u nika projeke ya wena maḓifhindzelekani a vhuḓifhindzelekani!
sidebar.step_7.title: 📜 Mulayo
sidebar.step_7.description: Milayo ya SACPCMP: CHSO na PrCHSA vha fanela u vhokanya ngodiso na zwiḽiṅwa zwa CPD u tshimbidza u tevedzela.
sidebar.step_7.fun_fact: 🧑‍💼 Tshenzhemo: Mutshidzi wa SACPCMP wo ngodiswaho a nga fokotsa zwiteṅwa zwa mulayo nga maḓifhindzelekani—MVP ya vhuḓifhindzelekani ya projeke ya wena!
sidebar.step_8.title: 📋 Mulayo
sidebar.step_8.description: Mulayo wa U Vaka 5(1)(l): Baklayenti vha fanela u amukela zwiteṅwa zwa H&S zwa mukontraka nga u vha mosebetsi u sa thomi.
sidebar.step_8.fun_fact: 📝 Tshenzhemo: Maḓifhindzelekani a ḓivhadzaho mo maphephani a nga sathusa u ḓivhadza ha projeke—muthu muṅwe na muṅwe u ḓivha maḓifhindzelekani a hawe!
sidebar.step_9.title: 📜 Mulayo
sidebar.step_9.description: Mulayo wa Vhutshilo na Vhuḓifhindzelekani mo Tirong: Maphepha a a nepagetsaho a tshimbidza u tevedzela na u sirhelela vhothe vho amegaho.
sidebar.step_9.fun_fact: 🛒 Tshenzhemo: Sekhwama sa wena ndi zwishumiswa zwa wena zwa vhuḓifhindzelekani—phepha ḽiṅwe na ḽiṅwe ḽo u ḽi oketšaho ḽi endla projeke ya wena i vhe na vhuḓifhindzelekani ho khulwaho!
